tacticalFamilies.name: Highly contagious disease outbreaks
tacticalFamilies.description: Deployment and support of activities tackling diseases which require to be contained with universal protection for patients and staff over the ordinary measures with an imposed limited timeframe

tacticalFamilies.name: Distributions
tacticalFamilies.description: Deployment and support of activities aiming atimmunization (preventive and curative), water access,shelter items and/or NFI distribution (protection,primary needs) for population coverage within apredefined execution timeframe

tacticalFamilies.name: Medical activities in emergency
tacticalFamilies.description: Deployment and support of first aid and primary needs activities with an imposed limited timeframe for implementation

tacticalFamilies.name: Surgical activities in emergency
tacticalFamilies.description: Deployment and support of surgical activities, with an imposed limited timeframe for implementation

tacticalFamilies.name: Health facilities
tacticalFamilies.description: Deployment and support of permanent hospitalization facilities with multiple services

tacticalFamilies.name: Mobile medical activities
tacticalFamilies.description: Deployment and support activities that imply a movement of staff and material aiming at reaching the beneficiaries in the place of need

tacticalFamilies.name: Out-patient department activities
tacticalFamilies.description: Deployment and support of ambulatory care activities aiming at population coverage

tacticalFamilies.name: Vertical IPD activities
tacticalFamilies.description: Deployment and support of specialized hospitalization facilities aiming at treating a specific disease

tacticalFamilies.name: Medical activities in restricted area
tacticalFamilies.description: Deployment and support of public health activities and/or consultations inside areas with controlled access or movement
